channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Le plan ingénieux d’Octopus Energy pour baisser votre facture grâce à un détail de votre compteur LinkyOctopus ballons
item.description: Le fournisseur Octopus Energy dévoile une offre d'électricité inédite en France. Elle utilise le Linky pour allumer ou éteindre le ballon d'eau chaude de manière dynamique, pour réduire la facture d'électricité.

item.title: Bon plan PS5 : le lecteur de disques pour Slim et Pro revient en promotion
item.description: Grâce à JoyBuy qui offre une légère promotion de 3,3 % sur le lecteur de disques de la PS5, il est possible de faire évoluer votre PlayStation 5 ou votre PlayStation 5 Pro à prix réduit.

item.title: AI’s promise to indie filmmakers: faster, cheaper, lonelier
item.description: AI expands access to filmmaking for resource-constrained creators. But as efficiency becomes the industry’s north star, creativity risks being overwhelmed by a deluge of low-effort, AI-generated content.

item.title: Prepare for pitch battle: Startup Battlefield 200 nominations are open
item.description: Nominations for TechCrunch Startup Battlefield 200 are open. Pitch at Disrupt 2026 in October in front of top VCs and the full TechCrunch audience. Nominate your startup or for one that's deserving.

item.title: Samsung’s Galaxy Z TriFold restock sold out in minutes
item.description: Samsung unleashed a new batch of Galaxy Z TriFold units after selling out initial stock of the behemoth foldable that turns into a 10-inch tablet. It took less than ten minutes to sell through today's supply, which either speaks to the phone's surprising popularity or, rather, just how few of them the company is making. […]

item.title: Tamron’s new dongle lets you wirelessly control your lens from your phone
item.description: Tamron has announced a new USB-C dongle that wirelessly connects compatible lenses to mobile devices and laptops so they can be customized and controlled remotely. It works with 16 of the company's lenses to start. The $50 Tamron-Link dongle is available now, and while its Bluetooth range is limited to just over 16-feet, it's one […]

item.title: FBI warns ATM "jackpotting" attacks are soaring - here's what you need to know
item.description: Physically breaking into an ATM is getting more popular and the FBI is sounding the alarm.

item.title: Couleurs, prix, design : on fait le point sur le futur MacBook pas cher
item.description: Le 4 mars, Apple organise un événement spécial qui devrait être consacré à des produits un peu meilleur marché que d'habitude chez le constructeur : il devrait en effet être question de l'iPhone 17e et surtout, de ce fameux MacBook d'entrée de gamme. En attendant la grande révélation, quelques rumeurs permettent d'imaginer à quoi ressemblera le portable....

item.title: Test du Samsung Galaxy Book 6 Ultra : la vision est accomplie
item.description: Pour cette année 2026, Samsung sort du chapeau son Galaxy Book 6 version Ultra. Panther Lake a-t-il enfin de quoi réaliser la vision du constructeur ? Réponse dans notre test.

item.title: Ubisoft lays off 40 staff working on Splinter Cell remake, says game remains in development
item.description: It has already been a depressingly busy year for layoffs at Ubisoft, and the French publisher’s Toronto studio is the latest workforce to be hit. Around 40 jobs have been cut at the studio, which is one of Ubisoft’s largest and has previously worked on games including Watch Dogs: Legion and Far Cry 6. "This decision was not taken lightly and does not in any way reflect the talent, dedication, or contributions of the individuals affected," Ubisoft said in a statement to Mobile Syrup, which first reported the new layoffs. "Our priority now is to support them through this transition with comprehe...

item.title: Peak XV raises $1.3B, doubles down on AI as global VC rivalry in India heats up
item.description: Peak XV says most of its new capital will target India as the firm prioritizes AI, fintech and cross-border bets while navigating recent partner departures.

item.title: Microsoft France supprime une centaine de postes à Issy-les-Moulineaux
item.description: Microsoft a annoncé son intention de fermer son centre d'ingénierie d'Issy-les-Moulineaux, menaçant une centaine de postes. Le géant américain souhaite centraliser ses forces dans des hubs internationaux, au détriment de son antenne française.

item.title: Transférer directement une eSIM d’iPhone vers un smartphone Android est possible, mais seulement chez cet opérateur
item.description: iOS 26.3 ajoute entre autres la possibilité de transférer une eSIM d'un iPhone vers un mobile Android. Mais la liste des opérateurs qui jouent le jeu en France est bien maigre pour le moment.

item.title: Watch the First ‘Witch Hat Atelier’ Trailer and Get Ready for Your New Anime Obsession
item.description: We finally have a great first look at how Kamome Shirahama's fantastic magical manga is being brought to animated life.

item.title: Fender Mix Headphones Review: So Much More Than a Branding Gimmick
item.description: It surprised me, but Fender's first pair of wireless headphones has some solid features that are actually worth paying for.

item.title: I review laptops for The Verge, ask me anything

item.title: The wellness wild west’s latest skincare fad is salmon sperm
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest gizmos and potions that swear they're going to change your life. item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 Super Early Bird rates end in 1 week
item.description: The lowest ticket rates of the year for TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ends next Friday, February 27. Save up to $680 on your pass. Register now before prices increase.

item.title: Les Pixel de Google peuvent enregistrer vos appels, voici comment faire
item.description: D'abord restreinte à certaines régions du monde, la fonction d'enregistrement des appels téléphoniques directement sur un Google Pixel arrive en France.

item.title: Trump bars two ‘not worthy’ governors from annual bipartisan meeting at White House, prompting backlash
item.description: Trump refused to invite Democratic governors Jared Polis of Colorado and Wes Moore of Maryland. The National Governors Association is pulling out of an annual meeting at the White House after President Donald Trump declined to invite two Democratic governors, undercutting one of Washington’s few remaining bipartisan gatherings.Trump is still expected to meet with governors at the White House on Friday but the event will not be facilitated by an organization founded more than a century ago to help state leaders from both parties advocate for their interests in Washington. The Republican preside...

item.title: « Une superintelligence ferait mieux que moi » : le constat choc de Sam Altman sur nos emplois
item.description: En Inde, le patron d'OpenAI, Sam Altman, prédit une superintelligence capable de surpasser les humains d'ici 2028. Même les PDG vont trinquer.

item.title: YouTube déploie Gemini sur TV : ce nouveau bouton permet d’interroger les vidéos
item.description: Fini le temps où vous regardiez passivement une recette de cuisine en essayant de deviner les proportions. Google déploie actuellement son bouton « Demander » (Ask), propulsé par l'intelligence artificielle Gemini, directement sur l'application YouTube de votre téléviseur. Une nouveauté qui promet de changer notre façon de consommer la vidéo depuis le canapé. ...

item.title: Why investors are going gaga over solid-state transformers
item.description: The technology promises to replace several parts of the grid with one device that’s both controllable and updatable.

item.title: Nintendo’s next big Pokémon presentation is on February 27th
item.description: Pokémon Day is always a big deal for Nintendo fans, but with this year being the franchise's 30th anniversary, the next Pokémon Presents stream is likely to bring the heat when it begins on February 27th at 9AM ET. With Pokémon Legends: Z-A behind us and Pokémon Pokopia right around the corner, chances are high […]

item.title: Google rejected nearly two million Android apps and blocked more than 80,000 developer accounts from Google Play in 2025
item.description: The numbers of removed apps and accounts are less than previous years, but still worryingly high.

item.title: Avec 40 % de remise sur le The Frame 2025, c’est la chute de prix qu’on attendait pour le plus beau téléviseur de Samsung
item.description: Le TV Samsung The Frame est l’un des plus originaux avec son design atypique en forme de tableau. Celui de 2025 met le paquet avec un taux de rafraîchissement à 144 Hz et si vous attendiez un prix accessible, c'est le moment : la version 55 pouces passe de 1 490 euros à 879 euros.

item.title: Google Pixel 11 : la nouvelle puce de sécurité Titan M3 ferait son apparition
item.description: Alors que le Pixel 10 est sorti depuis peu, c'est déjà son successeur qui fait parler de lui. Selon de nouvelles fuites, le Google Pixel 11, propulsé par la future puce Tensor G6, s’apprêterait à intégrer une nouvelle version de sa puce de sécurité Titan introduite en 2021.

item.title: Dangerous Massiv Android malware poses as IPTV app to infect devices and steal banking info
item.description: Fake IPTV apps used as covers for malware are rising in popularity, researchers discover.

item.title: Une IA a voulu « supprimer et recréer l’environnement » d’un serveur Amazon… et a provoqué une panne
item.description: Mettre l'IA aux commandes d'un serveur n'est peut-être pas une très bonne idée. Amazon Web Services a connu au moins deux interruptions de service ces derniers mois. En cause : des agents IA spécialisés dans le développement logiciel qui ont provoqué des pannes en faisant n'importe quoi. Amazon affirme néanmoins qu'il s'agissait d'erreur humaine.

item.title: It Might Be an Even Longer Wait for ‘KPop Demon Hunters 2’
item.description: Plus, 'Scream 7' can't escape the long arm of 'Scary Movie 6'.

item.title: The first discount on Samsung's newest cheap tablet has landed
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 Plus just got its first ever discount at Amazon, making the cheap yet capable tablet even more affordable.

item.title: Nintendo turned its biggest flop into an expensive, uncomfortable novelty
item.description: I've written about a lot of different video game hardware over the years, from new consoles to retro gadgets to whatever you want to call the Playdate. But I can't remember ever being perpetually sore from testing a device; such are the joys of the Virtual Boy. Nintendo has turned its biggest flop into an […]

item.title: OpenAI says 18 to 24-year-olds account for nearly 50% of ChatGPT usage in India
item.description: The company said on Friday that users between 18 and 24 years of age account for nearly 50% of all messages sent by Indians to ChatGPT, and users under 30 accounted for 80% of usage in the country.

item.title: Fuite de données chez PayPal : des transactions non autorisées ont touché certains comptes
item.description: PayPal révèle avoir été victime d'une fuite de données. Pendant près de six mois, des données sensibles de clients, dont des numéros de sécurité sociale, ont été collectées par des pirates. La faille a conduit à des transactions frauduleuses.

item.title: James Cameron just made 3 arguments against Netflix buying Warner Bros. The last one has stakes for the entire world
item.description: While many in Hollywood have resisted speaking out against the controversial megamerger, the ‘Titanic’ director said it would be ‘disastrous.’ The biggest drama in Hollywood in recent months hasn’t been on the silver screen but in the boardrooms of two of the most powerful companies in the industry.

item.title: Trump’s rollback of this key EPA finding will hit poor and minority Americans the hardest
item.description: The Environmental Protection Agency recently revoked the ‘endangerment finding,’ which is key in protecting the public from pollutants. In a stretch of Louisiana with about 170 fossil fuel and petrochemical plants, premature death is a fact of life for people living nearby. The air is so polluted and the cancer rates so high it is known as Cancer Alley.“Most adults in the area are attending two to three funerals per month,” said Gary C. Watson Jr., who was born and raised in St. John the Baptist Parish, a majority Black community in Cancer Alley about 30 miles outside of New Orleans. His fathe...

item.title: A brave YouTuber just modded their iPhone Air with a transparent case and built-in SIM card slot thanks to a 'dream collaboration' — but it isn't for the faint-hearted
item.description: One YouTuber hacked their iPhone Air to give it a transparent back and a SIM card slot. But the fresh new design also comes with a few downsides.

item.title: Your Coffee Grinder Is as Important as Your Brewer—Here Are the 5 Best We’ve Tested
item.description: We used particle size analysis and real-world testing to find the best conical burr, flat burr, and blade grinders for every budget and style of coffee drinker.

item.title: Wildlight Entertainment announces Highguard update that will add a new Base and Raid Tool despite recent website troubles
item.description: Despite recent website troubles, Wildlight Entertainment has confirmed that Highguard is still alive with the announcement of a new content update.
